level.heading: Compact not creating agency relationship
level.text: Each of the parties shall act solely on its own authority within the jurisdiction granted. This Compact shall not be construed as creating any agency relationship between the Parties.

level.heading: Emergency Act Amendments
level.text: For temporary (90-day) authorization of the District to remove disabled vehicles from any portion of the Potomac River Bridges, see notes following ยง 9-1117.01.
